482:1: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayāmāsa-bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte'dhvanyasaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpairasaṃkhyeyatarairyadāsīt|
482:2: tena kālena tena samayena jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
482:3: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān priyadarśane kalpe vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau|
482:4: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasya pravacane śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt|
482:5: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya vimaladattā nāma bhāryābhūt|
482:6: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrā rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya dvau putrāvabhūtām-eko vimalagarbho nāma,
482:9: prajñāvantau ca puṇyavantau ca jñānavantau ca bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ ca abhiyuktāvabhūtām|
482:11: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmupāyakauśalyapāramitāyāṃ maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyāmupekṣāyāṃ yāvat saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu|
482:19: sa ca bhagavāṃstena kālena tena samayena imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ deśayāmāsa teṣāṃ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
482:21: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako yena svamātā janayitrī,
482:23: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya janayitrīmetadavocatām ehyamba gamiṣyāvastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya|
482:25: eṣa hyamba sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ visteraṇa saṃprakāśayati,
482:27: evamukte kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā vimalagarbhaṃ dārakaṃ vimalanetraṃ ca dārakametadavocat-eṣa khalu kulaputrau yuvayoḥ pitā rājā śubhavyūho brāhmaṇeṣvabhiprasannaḥ|
482:29: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārako daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām-mithyādṛṣṭikule'sminnāvāṃ jātau?
482:31: atha khalu kulaputrā vimaladattā rājabhāryā tau dvau dārakāvetadavocat-sādhu sādhu kulaputrau|
482:32: yuvāṃ tasya svapitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai kiṃcideva prātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayatam|
482:34: prasannacittaśca asmākamanujānīyāt tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhigantum||
482:35: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ saptatālamātraṃ vaihāyasamabhyudgamya tasya pitū rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai buddhānujñātāni yamakāni prātihāryāṇyakurutām|
482:43: tau tasminnevākāśe mahāntau bhūtvā khuḍḍakau bhavataḥ,
482:48: iyadbhiḥ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā ṛddhiprātihāryaistābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ sa śubhavyūho rājā svapitā vinītaḥ|
482:49: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastayordārakayostamṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya tau dārakāvetadavocat-ko yuvayoḥ kulaputrau śāstā,
482:51: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau taṃ rājānaṃ śubhavyūhametadavocat-eṣa sa mahārāja bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati ratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle dharmāsanopaviṣṭaḥ|
482:52: sadevakasya lokasya purataḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati|
482:55: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastau dārakāvetadavocat-paśyāmo vayaṃ kulaputrau taṃ yuvayoḥ śāstāram|
482:57: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakau tato'ntarīkṣādavatīrya yena svamātā janayitrī tenopasaṃkrāmatām|
482:58: upasaṃkramya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya svamātaraṃ janayitrīmetadavocatām-eṣa āvābhyāmamba vinītaḥ svapitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau|
482:61: āvāṃ tasya bhagavataḥ sakāśe pravrajiṣyāva iti||
482:62: atha khalu kulaputrā vimalagarbho dārako vimalanetraśca dārakastasyāṃ velāyāṃ svamātaraṃ janayitrīṃ gāthābhyāmadhyabhāṣatām-
482:64: āvāṃ vai pravrajiṣyāvo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ||1||
482:69: vayaṃ pi pravrajiṣyāmo durlabho hi tathāgataḥ||3|| iti||
482:70: atha khalu kulaputrāstau dvau dārakāvime gāthe bhāṣitvā tau mātāpitarāvetadavocatām-sādhu amba tāta eta|
482:71: vayaṃ sarve sahitā bhūtvā gamiṣyāmastasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśam|
482:72: upasaṃkramiṣyāmastaṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya|
482:77: tasmāttarhi amba tāta paramapuṇyopastabdhā vayamīdṛśe pravacane upapannāḥ|
482:80: tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajiṣyāvaḥ|
482:81: durlabhaṃ hi amba tāta tathāgatānāṃ darśanam|
482:85: tena khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ samayena tasya rājñaḥ śūbhavyūhasya antaḥpurāccaturaśītirantaḥpurikāsahasrāṇi asya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya bhājanabhutānyabhūvan|
482:87: vimalagarbhaśca dārako bahukalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvasattvapāpajahane samādhau carito'bhūt kimiti sarvasattvāḥ sarvapāpaṃ jaheyuriti|
482:88: sā ca tayordārakayormātā vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvabuddhasaṃgītiṃ sarvabuddhadharmaguhyasthānāni ca saṃjānīte sma|
482:89: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ dārakābhyāṃ tathāgataśāsane vinītaḥ,
482:92: sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā sarvasvajanaparivārā tau ca dvau dārakau rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrau dvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāntapurau sāmātyau sarve sahitāḥ samagrāḥ yena bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,
482:94: upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantaṃ triṣkṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthuḥ||
482:95: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho rājānaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ saparivāramupasaṃkrāntaṃ viditvā dhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati|
482:96: atha khalu kulaputrā rājā śubhavyūhastena bhagavatā dhārmyā kathayā sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśitaḥ samādāpitaḥ samuttejitaḥ saṃpraharṣitastasyāṃ velāyāṃ tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ kanīyaso bhrātuḥ paṭṭaṃ baddhvā rājye pratiṣṭhāpya saputrasvajanaparivāraḥ,
482:98: tau ca dvau dārakau sārdhaṃ tairdvācatvāriṃśadbhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ,
482:99: sarve sahitāḥ samagrāstasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane śraddhayā agārādanagārikāṃ pravrajitāḥ|
482:100: pravrajitvā ca rājā śubhavyūhaḥ saparivāraścaturaśītivarṣasahasrāṇyabhiyukto vijahāra imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ cintayan bhāvayan paryavadāpayan|
482:101: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhasteṣāṃ caturaśītīnāṃ varṣasahasrāṇāmatyayena sarvaguṇālaṃkāravyūhaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate sma|
482:104: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājāḥ śubhavyūho gaganatale sthitastaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-imau bhagavan mama putrau śāstārau bhavataḥ|
482:109: kalyāṇamitrau bhagavan mama tau dvau dārakau putrarūpeṇa mama gṛha upapannau,
482:113: avaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ hi mahārāja kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ ca sarveṣu bhavagaticyutyupapattyāyataneṣūpapannānāṃ sulabhāni bhavanti kalyāṇamitrāṇi,
482:117: paśyasi tvaṃ mahārāja etau dvau dārakau?
482:120: bhagavānāha-etau khalu punarmahārāja kulaputrau pañcaṣṭīnāṃ gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike pūjāṃ kariṣyataḥ,
482:121: imaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyataḥ sattvānāmanukampāyai,
482:123: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rājā śubhavyūhastato gaganatalādavatīrya daśanakhamañjaliṃ pragṛhya taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-tatsādhu bhagavan|
482:124: nirdiśatu tathāgataḥ-kīdṛśena jñānena samanvāgatastathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena mūrdhni uṣṇīṣo vibhāti,
482:127: sā ca samasahitā dantāvalī vadanāntare virājati,
482:129: atha khalu kulaputrāḥ sa rāja śubhavyūha iyadbhirguṇaistaṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhiṣṭutya anyaiśca guṇakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ bhagavantamabhiṣṭutya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ jaladharagarjitabhoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvanmahārthamidaṃ tathāgataśāsanam,
482:132: adyāgreṇa vayaṃ bhagavanna bhūyaścittasya vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
482:135: na bhūyaḥ pāpakānāṃ cittotpādānāṃ vaśagā bhaviṣyāmaḥ|
482:136: ebhirahaṃ bhagavan iyadbhirakuśalaidharmaiḥ samanvāgato necchāmi bhagavato'ntikamupasaṃkramitum|
482:137: sa tasya bhagavato jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrajasaṃkusumitābhijñasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasābhivandya antarīkṣagata evāsthāt||
482:138: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe'kṣaipsīt|
482:139: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ|
482:141: tasmiṃśca paryaṅke tathāgatavigrahaḥ paryaṅkabaddhaṃ saṃdṛśyate sma|
482:144: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ||
482:145: atha khalu bhagavān jaladharagarjitaghoṣasusvaranakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijñastathāgataścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma-paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadantam?
482:147: bhagavānāha-eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
482:148: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau|
482:150: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
482:152: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati|
482:154: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?
482:155: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam|
482:157: ayameva sa padmaśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhut|
482:158: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
482:159: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam|
482:161: ayaṃ sa vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitadhvajarājo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma rājabhāryābhut|
482:162: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato'bhūt|
482:163: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā-anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
482:164: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam|
482:166: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām|
482:167: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
482:170: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena||
482:171: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham||
482:172: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ||
